name: Haipeng Dai 0001
content: Haipeng Dai's homepage Home Biography Publications Professional Activities Projects Students Teaching Reading List CONTACT Professor (教授)Doctoral Supervisor (博士生导师)IET Fellow (英国工程技术学会会士)Young Chang Jiang Scholar (教育部青年长江学者)ACM/IEEE Senior Member, CCF杰出会员School of Computer Science 025-89681985 haipengdai@nju.edu.cn CS Building 542, Nanjing University 163 Xianlin Blvd. Nanjing, Jiangsu 210023, China LANDS (先进网络与数据科学研究组) RECRUITING I am looking for well motivated students to work on cutting-edge research projects. Both undergraduate and graduate students are welcome! [My poster (宣传海报)] NEWS (11/2025) Our paper "Deploying UAVs and Surveillance Cameras for Continuous Omnidirectional Monitoring" is accepted by TMC! (10/2025) Our paper "Fine-grained Head Orientation Tracking Using Head-mounted Acoustic Devices" is accepted by TMC! (10/2025) Our paper "Robust Index Benefit Estimation via Hierarchical and Two-dimensional Feature Representation" is accepted by ICDE 2026! (10/2025) Our paper "RoLEX: A LoRa-based Rotation Speed Measurement System for Ubiquitous Long-distance Monitoring Applications" is accepted by TMC! (09/2025) Our paper "Bi-level Bandwidth Coordination for Multiple Video Inference at the Edge" is accepted by TNET! (08/2025) Our paper "Parallel Wormhole Filters: High-Performance Approximate Membership Query Data Structures for Persistent Memory" is accepted by TPDS! (08/2025) Our paper "Automated End-to-End Model Serving with Cooperative Compiling and Scheduling" is accepted by EuroSys 2026! (07/2025) Our paper "Decoding RSSI Compression in RFID: Dynamic RCS Modeling and Tag-Intrinsic Power Metrics for Reliable Backscatter Networks" is accepted by NSDI 2026! (07/2025) Our paper "AccCall: Enhancing Real-Time Phone Call Quality with Smartphone's Built-in Accelerometer" is accepted by UbiComp 2025! (07/2025) Our two papers are accepted by TMC! (06/2025) Our paper "Adaptive Charging with Beam Steering" is accepted by TMC! (06/2025) Our paper "Hourglass: An Adaptive Range Filter with Lightweight Hybrid Encoding" is accepted by SIGMOD 2026! (05/2025) I will serve as a TPC member in INFOCOM 2026! (03/2025) Our paper "Local-to-cloud Database Synchronization via Fine-grained Hybrid Compression" is accepted by ICDE 2025! (03/2025) Our paper "Acoustic Sensing for Multi-User Heartbeat Monitoring Using Dualforming" is accepted by TMC! (02/2025) Our paper "Optimizing Monitoring Utility of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles Considering Adverse Effects" is accepted by TMC! (01/2025) Our paper "Empower Vision Applications with LoRA LMM" is accepted by EuroSys 2025! (01/2025) Our two papers are accepted by TMC!
